name: All The Right Type Database File
summary: Database file used by All The Right Type, an educational program used to teach students keyboard typing skills; stores teacher and student performance records; enables teachers to track progress and create reports; generally handled in the background by the software and not manually opened or edited by the user.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Ingenuity Works All The Right Type

macos.display_name: Ingenuity Works All The Right Type
